text:
As used in this Article: 
     (a)     "Bonds" means any bonds, notes, certificates of indebtedness or other evidences of indebtedness issued after April 1, 1991, by a public body which is authorized to issue bonds, notes, certificates of indebtedness or other evidence of indebtedness. 
     (b)     "Public body" means the City or any Commission, Department or Agency thereof.
     (c)     "Governing body" means the governing board, commission, board of supervisors, board of directors or similar multimember body which exercises authority over a public body. 
(Added by Ord. 12-00, File No. 992117, App. 2/11/2000)
